title: Spicy Slow Cooker Chicken Cacciatore with Wine

Ingredients.4: 1 medium green bell pepper, seeded and chopped

Ingredients.5: 1 medium yellow bell pepper, seeded and chopped

Ingredients.6: 1 medium orange bell pepper, seeded and chopped

Ingredients.7: 1 medium red bell pepper, seeded and chopped

Ingredients.9: 3 tablespoons red pepper flakes, or more to taste

Ingredients.11: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.13: 0.75 cup white sugar, or to taste

Directions.1: The night before cooking, layer ingredients into a slow cooker in the following order: chicken, wine, onion, bell peppers, garlic, red pepper flakes, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, diced tomatoes, sugar, and tomato sauce. Cover and place in the refrigerator so chicken can soak up the wine, 8 hours to overnight.

Directions.2: The next morning, remove from the refrigerator and cook on Low, stirring occasionally, for 6 hours. Remove chicken and shred meat with 2 forks; return meat to the cooker.

Directions.3: Cook on High with lid slightly off to allow juices to evaporate and sauce to condense, about 2 more hours.
